name: DARK (itch) (Antibastian)
description:
DARK - A game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

STORY:

"You're trapped in an unknown place, escape is possible but a challenge awaits in front of you. Everytime you successfully entered the door in the room you're currently in, you basically rewind to the beginning with some elements of the room either semi-transparent or completely invisible. There is still hope, though. WILL YOU ESCAPE?"

CONTROLS:

Move - Arrow Keys or A & D

Jump - Spacebar

Pause - Escape Key

WHAT DOES THE MASTER PACKAGE INCLUDE?:
The master package includes:

 Music (Both used and unused).

A 32-bit and 64-bit version for windows.

A README file.
